title: Pulsefire Ezreal Name
body:
When I play pulsefire ezreal, my name shows up in chat as:
TridentSPQR():
when it should be
TridentSPQR(Ezreal):

replies.body:
Hey TridentSPQR! 

Thanks for the report! We're currently working on a fix for this!
I think it's jut an Ezreal Bug In General noticed this during URF with enemy ezreals.
